definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: Turn right onto Ford Road and take the first street on your left.
sentences.chinese: 右转到福特路，然后第一条街左转。

sentences.english: Then walk to the traffic light. Make another left to Wooster.
sentences.chinese: 然后再走到交通灯处，再往左转就到了。

sentences.english: Keep going along Chang An Road and turn left at the first traffic lights.
sentences.chinese: 沿着长安路笔直走，到第一个红绿灯后左转。

sentences.english: Go up to the stop sign and turn left.
Go straight on, then take the first turning on the left.
sentences.chinese: 一直往前走，然后在第一个转弯处向左转。

sentences.english: Go straight and turn left. The gate is there.
sentences.chinese: 一直走然后左转，大门就在那儿。

sentences.english: At Vicroads exit, we turn left.
I' ll stop for you at the crossroads.
sentences.chinese: 我们沿着这条路走，在十字路口左转。

sentences.english: Turn left and walk straight to the end, look for GENTING BUS.
sentences.chinese: 向左转然后一直走到底，找到云顶巴士。

sentences.english: TWA 2341, for noise abatement turn right 45 degrees.
sentences.chinese: 为了降低噪音，请左转45度。

sentences.english: Shusheng swerved the car to the left and that swerve saved his life.
sentences.chinese: 书生突然把车向左转，而这一举动挽救了他的性命。

sentences.english: When you get to a traffic light with Jiuxianqiao road, you will turn left.
sentences.chinese: 接下来的红绿灯位于酒仙桥路，左转。

sentences.english: The road turned square to the left.
sentences.chinese: 这条路成直角向左转去。

sentences.english: The ant needs to turn left, and then go forward to the jellybean.
sentences.chinese: 蚂蚁需要先向左转，然后往前走才能吃到糖果。

sentences.english: Go along the street and turn left an the crossing.
sentences.chinese: 延着这条街向前走，十字路口处向左转。

sentences.english: Then he turned left and followed the brass line due north toward the obelisk.
sentences.chinese: 接着，他向左转身，沿着铜线向北面的方尖碑走去。

definition: to go straight/straight forward/fig. to do right
to go round a curve/to turn a corner/fig. a new direction
to turn/to go around a corner
variant of 掉頭|掉头[diao4 tou2]
to turn one's head/to turn round/to turn about
